resources.string:
HINTS:

 	^ for power function 
 	ln for logarithmic function 
 	e for exponential function 
 	sin,cos,tan for trigonometric functions 





ABOUT:

this app is developed for mathematics 101 innovative project and it uses trapezoidal rule for approximate integration.
